Title: .NET Dev Tools Dashboard
Description:
.NET Dev Tools Dashboard is a WPF application that implements the Prism 4 standards.
Modules can be added at runtime and after install of the base Dashboard shell.
The first module is a WPF Gui for NAnt based on Colin Svingen's Gui for NAnt open source app for Windows Forms.
HomeWiki:
.NET Dev Tools Dashboard is an extendable .NET development toolbox written in WPF .NET 4.0.



Project Description
.NET Dev Tools Dashboard is a WPF application that implements the Prism 4 standards.
Modules can be added at runtime and after install of the base Dashboard shell.
The first module is a WPF Gui for NAnt based on Colin Svingen's Gui for NAnt open source app for Windows Forms.

Please visit the website at http://www.techno-fly.net and http://techno-fly.homeserver.com:8000/forum/ for extensive developer resources and the project blog.
